creatorText: Greetings, Gumroad community! I'm Phil Wornath, the mind behind AI Summary Helper. My passion for in-depth online articles and the challenge of limited reading time propelled me to create this productivity-enhancing tool.
whyHelperList: Save Time: Quickly synthesize articles or set up more extensive reading sessions.
Customizable Summaries: Adapt summaries to your style, industry, or perspective.
Streamline Reading Lists: Reduce browser tab overload and manage your articles effectively.
Optimize Your Reading: Focus on key content without distraction.
getStartedText: To begin enhancing your web reading with AI Summary Helper, secure an OpenAI API key and ensure sufficient credits. Experience easier, more efficient web browsingâ€”download on Gumroad today.
feedbackSupportText: Try AI Summary Helper and share your experience! We welcome all feedback and queries. Boost your online reading capabilities with us today!
